entry.title: From Deepfakes to Malware: AI's Expanding Role in Cyber Attacks
entry.summary: Large language models (LLMs) powering artificial intelligence (AI) tools today could be exploited to develop self-augmenting malware capable of bypassing YARA rules. "Generative AI can be used to evade string-based YARA rules by augmenting the source code of small malware variants, effectively lowering detection rates," Recorded Future said in a new report shared with The Hacker News.

entry.title: PRN Sabah mungkin menyaksikan pemilihan Parlimen Putatan - Bung Moktar

entry.title: Sate vegan, inovasi baharu berasaskan jantung, umbut pisang

entry.summary: Program itu dapat mengesan dengan cepat sasaran berpotensi hampir di mana-mana sahaja di dunia.

entry.title: Pelihara kaedah pembuatan bedak sejuk secara tradisional sejak 1975

entry.title: Celine Dion menanti masa untuk kembali beraksi
entry.summary: Celine Dion yang berusia 55 tahun sudah semakin pulih daripada penyakit Stiff Person Syndrome (SPS) yang menyebabkan ototnya kaku.

entry.title: Penduduk Mexico tidur beramai-ramai rai Hari Tidur Sedunia

entry.title: Malaysia sambut penerbangan sulung China Eastern Airlines dari Kunming

entry.summary: Dengan ketiadaan Matthew dan Junior, Harimau Malaya kini mempunyai 31 pemain dalam kem latihan.

entry.summary: Aaron Chia-Soh Wooi Yik hanya selangkah lagi untuk menamatkan penantian 17 tahun kejuaraan bagi kategori beregu lelaki di Kejohanan Badminton All England 2024.

entry.title: Hackers Using Cracked Software on GitHub to Spread RisePro Info Stealer
entry.summary: Cybersecurity researchers have found a number of GitHub repositories offering cracked software that are used to deliver an information stealer called RisePro. The campaign, codenamed gitgub, includes 17 repositories associated with 11 different accounts, according to G DATA.
